remarks: Closure of motions.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismot.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismot.m $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
motgrp.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
motco.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( G Ismt G ) ) $.
motcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
motcl $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) e. P ) $.
